subject: Baseball
Bicycles and Bicycling
Skateboarding
lead_paragraph: Many of the Orioles ride bikes to the ballpark and some even use motorized contraptions, but this season has been a bumpier experience for the team in comparison to the joy ride of 2012.
snippet: Many of the Orioles ride bikes to the ballpark and some even use motorized contraptions, but this season has been a bumpier experience for the team in comparison to the joy ride of 2012.
